tagline: Fork of the official texlipse project from https://sourceforge.net/projects/texlipse/
name: Texlipse
body:
## Welcome TeXlipse
```
$ git clone https://github.com/MichaelSp/texlipse.git
```
### Update Site (not ready yet)

```
http://michaelsp.github.com/texlipse
```
